snippet.title: OFFICIAL KICKSTARTER TRAILER | Trüberbrook
snippet.description:
Trüberbook - A Nerd Saves the World
Enjoy an adventurous vacation in a 1960’s parallel universe! A Sci-Fi-Mystery Adventure Game with handmade scenery.
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/1995524156/truberbrook-a-nerd-saves-the-world
------
GERMANY: Approved for children aged 6 and above by the USK / Freigegeben ab 6 Jahren von der USK.
EUROPE: Rated suitable for people 12 and older by PEGI. Content Descriptor: Violence.
US/CANADA: Rated suitable for Teenagers (age 13 and up) by the ESRB. Descriptors: Mild Violence, Suggestive Themes, Use of Alcohol and Tobacco.
AUSTRALIA: Parental guidance recommended by the OFLC.
------
Visit us at: 
http://trueberbrook.com/
https://twitter.com/trueberbrook
https://www.instagram.com/trueberbrook/
https://www.facebook.com/Trueberbrook/
